document.full_text: 'by the way, meet vera stark' imagines the back story of one of those talented black actresses seen on 1930s movie screens almost exclusively in the roles of maids, slaves or mammies.
document.title: theater review | 'by the way, meet vera stark': a black actress trying to rise above a maid
lines_and_colors: 'by the way, meet vera stark' imagines the back story of one of those talented black actresses seen on 1930s movie screens almost exclusively in the roles of maids, slaves or mammies.
